response: i'm an ai language model and not a doctor, but i can help suggest some approaches. if you are feeling unsatisfied with the current diagnosis or are still searching for answers, it's always a good idea to ask for a second opinion. even if they arrive at the same conclusion as your current doctor, it can help ease your mind. additionally, you can also discuss your concerns about cancer with your doctor. they'll be able to tell you whether your symptoms align with common cancer symptoms and can order additional diagnostic tests if necessary. keep in mind that though it's normal to worry, self-diagnosing, especially when considering serious conditions like cancer, can create unnecessary stress. make sure to talk to health professionals who can guide you after a thorough examination and testing based on your symptoms.
